metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13117 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In numbers.c in libxslt 1.1.33, an xsl:number with certain format strings could lead to a uninitialized read in xsltNumberFormatInsertNumbers. This could allow an attacker to discern whether a byte on the stack contains the characters A, a, I, i, or 0, or any other character.

criterions.comment: libxslt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
